value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I will not lose again. Not this time!
I claim both the summoner and this
country in the name of Niðavellir!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Wait! Princess Reginn, are you
sure this is what you want?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What sort of question is that?
O-of course it is!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You lack conviction. I can tell.$k$pI would rather not fight a meaningless
battle against someone with no will
to fight. So, please, would you—$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Ugh... Shut up, shut up, shut UP!$k$p$EFace_Pain|Even if it means I die here and now,
I will prove myself worthy of my...
my king!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Oppose me at your own peril. I have
no intention of taking prisoners!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Uwaaauuughh!$k$pBrother! Please forgive me!$k$p$EFace_Pain|I was too weak... I couldn't...
It was too much for me...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She seems different from how she
was a moment ago... Is this the same
Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn. You held back.
That is why you lost... But why?$k$pIf there's anything you can tell us,
please do. We will gladly listen.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|P-Prince Alfonse... Why are—
Are you worried about me?$k$pUp until a moment ago, I was your
enemy. I said I would kill you.$k$pThe people of Askr are truly kind,
aren't you? Kinder than I ever could
have imagined.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Reginn, can you tell
us anything? Anything at all?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...All right. That's it. I've made
up my mind! I'm coming with
you—to help you fight!$k$p$EFace_Cool|My brother, King Fáfnir, he's—$k$pY-you have to stop him!$k$p$Sbs150|
